meanings.definition: A stick with a flag on it, used to mark the location of a hole on a golf course.
meanings.sent1: The golfers aimed for the flagsticks to know where to hit the ball.
meanings.sent2: The wind gently moved the flagsticks on the green.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel thought the flagsticks were giant lollipops.
meanings.sent4: The flagsticks stood tall like guardians of the golf course.
meanings.sent5: The bright red flag on the flagsticks waved cheerfully in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The flag itself, attached to a stick for marking purposes.
meanings.sent1: She waved the flagsticks to signal the end of the game.
meanings.sent2: The colorful flagsticks fluttered in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the flagsticks were magic wands.
meanings.sent4: The flagsticks in the parade added a splash of color to the street.
meanings.sent5: The old flagsticks bore the marks of many golf tournaments.
